planting_material_source.title: Source of seeds
planting_material_source.placeholder: Commercial / own seeds, seed cultivar, etc.
planting_material_source.placeholder_en: Commercial / own seeds, seed cultivar, etc.

planting_notes.title: Sowing notes
planting_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "soil was drier than usual at the time of sowing"
planting_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "soil was drier than usual at the time of sowing"
planting_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havaintoja, esim. "maa oli tavallista kuivempi"

N_in_applied_fertilizer.title: Amount of total nitrogen (N) in fertilizer (kg/ha)

N_in_soluble_fertilizer.title: Amount of soluble nitrogen (N) in fertilizer (kg/ha)

fertilizer_notes.title: Notes on fertilizer application
fertilizer_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "biostimulant was added because the field suffered from drought"
fertilizer_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "biostimulant was added because the field suffered from drought"
fertilizer_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havaintoja, esim. "lisäsin biostimulanttia pellon kuivuuden vuoksi"

tillage_treatment_notes.title: Tillage notes
tillage_treatment_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "had to stop tillage and continue the next day"
tillage_treatment_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "had to stop tillage and continue the next day"
tillage_treatment_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havaintoja, esim. "jatkoin muokkausta seuraavana päivänä"

oneOf.title: harvest
oneOf.description: If you left the harvest residue on the field, please add a new event (fertilizer application or tillage) accordingly.
oneOf.description_en: If you left the harvest residue on the field, please add a new event (fertilizer application or tillage) accordingly.
oneOf.description_fi: Jos jätit korjuutähteet pellolle, tee tästä uusi soveltuva tapahtuma (lannoitus- tai maanmuokkaus-).

oneOf.title: Left in the field as green manure
Left in the field for tillage incorporation

harvest_residue_help_text.title: If you left the harvest residue on the field, please add a new event (fertilizer application or tillage) accordingly.
harvest_residue_help_text.title_fi: Jos jätit korjuutähteet pellolle, tee tästä uusi soveltuva tapahtuma (lannoitus- tai maanmuokkaus-).

harvest_comments.title: Harvest comments
harvest_comments.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "cutting height was not uniform"
harvest_comments.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "cutting height was not uniform"
harvest_comments.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havaintoja, esim. "leikkuukorkeus ei ollut sama kaikkialla"

oneOf.title: General pest and diseases losses (due to rot, tikka, leafminer, etc.)
oneOf.title_fi: Yleiset tuhoeläin- ja tautivahingot (mätä, miinaajat jne.)

chemical_applic_notes.title: Chemical application notes
chemical_applic_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "rot affecting X % of plants"
chemical_applic_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "rot affecting X % of plants"
chemical_applic_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havintoja, esim. "mätää X % kasveista"

grazing_notes.title: Grazing notes
grazing_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "animals were too late to the field"
grazing_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "animals were too late to the field"
grazing_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havaintoja, esim. "eläimet vietiin pellolle liian myöhään"

weeding_notes.title: Notes on the extraction of weeds
weeding_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "the weeds had very deep roots"
weeding_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "the weeds had very deep roots"
weeding_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havintoja, esim. "rikkakasvien juuret olivat syvällä"

irrigation_notes.title: Irrigation notes
irrigation_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "drip line flow rate seems a bit low"
irrigation_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "drip line flow rate seems a bit low"
irrigation_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havintoja, esim. "tippukasteluletkun virtausnopeus vaikuttaa melko hitaalta"

mowing_notes.title: Mowing notes
mowing_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "mowing height was not uniform"
mowing_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "mowing height was not uniform"
mowing_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havaintoja, esim. "leikkuukorkeus ei ollut sama kaikkialla"

bed_prep_notes.title: Notes on the preparation of raised beds
bed_prep_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "used the beds from last year"
bed_prep_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "used the beds from last year"
bed_prep_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havintoja, esim. "käytettiin samoja kasvatuslaatikoita kuin edellisenä vuonna"

mulch_placement_notes.title: Mulch placement notes
mulch_placement_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "mulch was placed only on the northern half of the field"
mulch_placement_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "mulch was placed only on the northern half of the field"
mulch_placement_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havintoja, esim. "kate levitettiin ainoastaan pellon pohjoiselle puoliskolle"

mulch_removal_notes.title: Mulch removal notes
mulch_removal_notes.placeholder: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "the mulch was recycled"
mulch_removal_notes.placeholder_en: Any notes or observations about the event, e.g. "the mulch was recycled"
mulch_removal_notes.placeholder_fi: Mitä tahansa tapahtumaan liittyviä muistiinpanoja tai havintoja, esim. "kate kierrätettiin"
